pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhārenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhāressanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.5: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.8: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhārentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhāressanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.15: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.2.2: Tassā vinā chattupāhanaṁ na phāsu hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.2.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.2.6.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā chattupāhanaṁ dhāreyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.1.8: yassā vinā chattupāhanaṁ na phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.1.10: tīṇi chattāni— setacchattaṁ, kilañjacchattaṁ, paṇṇacchattaṁ maṇḍalabaddhaṁ salākabaddhaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.2.1: Agilānā agilānasaññā chattupāhanaṁ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.2.2: Agilānā vematikā chattupāhanaṁ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.2.3: Agilānā gilānasaññā chattupāhanaṁ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.2.4: Chattaṁ dhāreti na upāhanaṁ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.2.5: Upāhanaṁ dhāreti na chattaṁ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
